atk-s0302a:258_7: Evaṃ imasmiṃ sutte natiyā ca āgatigatiyā ca antare ekova sandhi kathitoti. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:262_4: (sotāpattiyā ca aṅgaṃ,) yaṃ pubbabhāge sotāpattipaṭilābhāya saṃvattati,
atk-s0302a:262_6: paṭiladdhaguṇassa ca sotāpattiṃ patvā ṭhitassa aṅgaṃ,
atk-s0302a:262_11: Ñāyoti paṭiccasamuppannaṃ ñatvā ṭhitañāṇampi paṭiccasamuppādopi. Yathāha –
atk-s0302a:262_15: Sudiṭṭho hotīti aparāparaṃ uppajjitvā dassanavasena suṭṭhu diṭṭho.
atk-s0302a:263_0: Khīṇanirayotiādīsu āyatiṃ tattha anuppajjanatāya khīṇo nirayo mayhanti so ahaṃ khīṇanirayo.
atk-s0302a:263_5: Sambodhiparāyanoti uttarimaggattayasaṅkhāto sambodhi paraṃ ayanaṃ mayhanti sohaṃ sambodhiparāyano,
atk-s0302a:264_2: Verañca nāmetaṃ duvidhaṃ hoti bāhiraṃ ajjhattikanti.
atk-s0302a:264_3: Ekena hi ekassa pitā mārito hoti,
atk-s0302a:264_4: so cintesi “etena kira me pitā mārito,
atk-s0302a:264_5: ahampi taṃyeva māressāmī”ti nisitaṃ satthaṃ ādāya carati.
atk-s0302a:264_8: Yā pana itarassa “ayaṃ kira maṃ māressāmīti carati,
atk-s0302a:264_9: ahameva naṃ paṭhamataraṃ māressāmī”ti cetanā uppajjati,
atk-s0302a:264_12: Yā pana taṃ niraye uppannaṃ disvā “etaṃ paharissāmī”ti jalitaṃ ayamuggaraṃ gaṇhato nirayapālassa cetanā uppajjati,
atk-s0302a:264_14: Yā cassa “ayaṃ niddosaṃ maṃ paharissāmīti āgacchati,
atk-s0302a:264_15: ahameva naṃ paṭhamataraṃ paharissāmī”ti cetanā uppajjati,
atk-s0302a:264_24: surāmadamattena idaṃ nāma kata”ntiādinā nayena veruppatti veditabbā.
atk-s0302a:264_31: taṃ sabbaṃ visuddhimagge anussatiniddese vuttameva. Paṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:268_2: Samudayanti dve samudayā khaṇikasamudayo ca paccayasamudayo ca.
atk-s0302a:268_8: Desessāmīti idaṃ vaṭṭadukkhassa samudayaatthaṅgamaṃ nibbattibhedaṃ nāma desessāmi,
atk-s0302a:268_10: Paṭiccāti nissayavasena ceva ārammaṇavasena ca paccayaṃ katvā.
atk-s0302a:268_11: Tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phassoti tiṇṇaṃ saṅgatiyā phasso. Ayaṃ kho,
atk-s0302a:268_13: dukkhassa samudayoti ayaṃ vaṭṭadukkhassa nibbatti nāma.
atk-s0302a:268_15: Evañhi vaṭṭadukkhaṃ bhinnaṃ hoti appaṭisandhiyaṃ. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:270_0: 44. Catutthe lokassāti saṅkhāralokassa. Ayamettha viseso. Catutthaṃ.
atk-s0302a:272_5: yaṃ ṭhānaṃ upagatena sakkā hoti bhagavato saddaṃ sotuṃ,
atk-s0302a:272_7: So kira gandhakuṭipariveṇasammajjanatthaṃ āgato attano kammaṃ pahāya bhagavato dhammaghosaṃ suṇanto aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0302a:272_8: Addasāti tadā kira bhagavato āditova paccayākāraṃ manasikarontassa “idaṃ iminā paccayena hoti,
atk-s0302a:272_9: idaṃ iminā”ti āvajjato yāva bhavaggā ekaṅgaṇaṃ ahosi,
atk-s0302a:272_10: satthā manasikāraṃ pahāya vacasā sajjhāyaṃ karonto yathānusandhinā desanaṃ niṭṭhapetvā,
atk-s0302a:272_11: “api nu kho imaṃ dhammapariyāyaṃ koci assosī”ti āvajjento taṃ bhikkhumaddasa.
atk-s0302a:273_1: Atha vā assosi noti amhākaṃ bhāsantānaṃ assosīti.
atk-s0302a:273_2: Uggaṇhāhītiādīsu sutvā tuṇhībhūtova paguṇaṃ karonto uggaṇhāti nāma.
atk-s0302a:273_3: Padānupadaṃ ghaṭetvā vācāya paricitaṃ karonto pariyāpuṇāti nāma.
atk-s0302a:273_4: Ubhayathāpi paguṇaṃ ādhārappattaṃ karonto dhāreti nāma.
atk-s0302a:273_7: Iti tīsupi imesu suttesu vaṭṭavivaṭṭameva kathitaṃ. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:275_0: 46. Chaṭṭhe aññataroti nāmavasena apākaṭo aññataro brāhmaṇo. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0302a:277_0: 47. Sattame jāṇussoṇīti ṭhānantaravasena evaṃladdhanāmo asītikoṭivibhavo mahāpurohito. Sattamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:279_5: mahantaṃ gambhīranti upadhāritabbaṃ parittaṃ bhāvaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ.
atk-s0302a:279_9: devamanussādibhāvena paṭhamaṃ hutvā pacchā na hotīti ucchedaṃ sandhāya pucchati.
atk-s0302a:279_13: sabbaṃ puthutta”nti imā dve ucchedadiṭṭhiyoti veditabbā. Aṭṭhamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:281_0: 49. Navame kiṃ nu khoti saṃsayuppattiākāradassanaṃ. Samudayatīti uppajjati. Navamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:283_0: 50. Dasame dvepi nayā ekato vuttā. Idameva purimena nānattaṃ, sesaṃ tādisamevāti. Dasamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:287_2: Jarāmaraṇanti kasmā jarāmaraṇaṃ ekameva “anekavidhaṃ nānappakāraka”nti vatvā gahitanti ce?
atk-s0302a:287_4: Yathā hi cūḷāya gahite purise so puriso gahitova hoti,
atk-s0302a:287_5: evaṃ jarāmaraṇe gahite sabbadukkhaṃ gahitameva hoti.
atk-s0302a:287_6: Tasmā “yaṃ kho idaṃ anekavidhaṃ nānappakārakaṃ dukkhaṃ loke uppajjatī”ti nhatvā ṭhitaṃ purisaṃ viya sabbadukkhaṃ
atk-s0302a:287_7: dassetvā taṃ cūḷāya gaṇhanto viya jarāmaraṇaṃ gaṇhi.
atk-s0302a:288_0: Jarāmaraṇanirodhasāruppagāminīti jarāmaraṇanirodhassa sāruppabhāvena nikkilesatāya parisuddhatāya sadisāva hutvā gāminīti attho.
atk-s0302a:288_1: Tathā paṭipanno ca hotīti yathā taṃ paṭipannoti vuccati,
atk-s0302a:288_5: Dukkhakkhayāya paṭipannoti sīlaṃ ādiṃ katvā jarāmaraṇadukkhassa nirodhatthāya paṭipanno.
atk-s0302a:289_0: Idāni arahattaphalapaccavekkhaṇaṃ satatavihārañca dassetvā desanā nivattetabbā siyā,
atk-s0302a:289_1: tathā akatvā avijjāgatoti idaṃ kasmā gaṇhātīti?
atk-s0302a:289_3: Apica puna vaṭṭaṃ ārabhitvā vivaṭṭe kathiyamāne bujjhanakasatto cettha atthi,
atk-s0302a:289_5: Tattha avijjāgatoti avijjāya gato upagato samannāgato.
atk-s0302a:289_8: Buddhānañhi sammutikathā paramatthakathāti dve kathā honti.
atk-s0302a:289_9: Tattha “satto naro puriso puggalo tisso nāgo”ti evaṃ pavattā sammutikathā nāma.
atk-s0302a:289_10: “Khandhā dhātuyo āyatanānī”ti evaṃ pavattā paramatthakathā nāma.
atk-s0302a:289_12: Te sammutiṃ kathentāpi paramatthaṃ kathentāpi saccameva kathenti.
atk-s0302a:294_2: Puññūpagaṃ hoti viññāṇanti kammaviññāṇaṃ kammapuññena upagataṃ sampayuttaṃ hoti,
atk-s0302a:294_4: Apuññaṃ ce saṅkhāranti dvādasacetanābhedaṃ apuññābhisaṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharoti.
atk-s0302a:294_8: Ettha ca tividhassa kammābhisaṅkhārassa gahitattā dvādasapadiko paccayākāro gahitova hoti.
atk-s0302a:295_4: Ettha ca paṭhamameva avijjāya pahīnāya vijjā uppajjati.
atk-s0302a:295_5: Yathā pana caturaṅgepi tame rattiṃ padīpujjalena andhakāro pahīyati,
atk-s0302a:295_7: Na kiñci loke upādiyatīti loke kiñci dhammaṃ na gaṇhāti na parāmasati.
atk-s0302a:295_8: Anupādiyaṃ na paritassatīti anupādiyanto agaṇhanto neva taṇhāparitassanāya,
atk-s0302a:296_0: So sukhaṃ ce vedananti idaṃ kasmā ārabhi?
atk-s0302a:296_1: Khīṇāsavassa paccavekkhaṇañāṇaṃ dassetvā satatavihāraṃ dassetuṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0302a:296_6: Sukhaṃ abhinandantoyeva hi dukkhaṃ abhinandati nāma dukkhaṃ patvā sukhaṃ patthanato sukhassa ca vipariṇāmadukkhatoti.
atk-s0302a:297_0: Tattha pañcadvārikavedanā pacchā uppajjitvā paṭhamaṃ nirujjhati,
atk-s0302a:297_3: Pañcadvārikā pavatte pañcadvāravasena pavattamānā paṭhamavaye vīsativassakāle rajjanadussanamuyhanavasena adhimattā balavatī hoti,
atk-s0302a:297_5: saṭṭhivassakālato paṭṭhāya parihāyamānā asītinavutivassakāle mandā hoti.
atk-s0302a:297_6: Tadā hi sattā “cirarattaṃ ekato nisīdimhā nipajjimhā”ti vadantepi “na sañjānāmā”ti vadanti.
atk-s0302a:297_8: “sugandhaṃ duggandhaṃ vā sāduṃ asāduṃ vā thaddhaṃ mudukanti vā na jānāmā”ti vadanti.
atk-s0302a:297_11: Sāpi anupubbena parihāyamānā maraṇasamaye hadayakoṭiṃyeva nissāya pavattati.
atk-s0302a:299_0: Yathā hi puriso pañcaudakamaggasampannaṃ vāpiṃ kareyya,
atk-s0302a:299_1: paṭhamaṃ deve vuṭṭhe pañcahi udakamaggehi udakaṃ pavisitvā antovāpiyaṃ āvāṭe pūreyya,
atk-s0302a:299_2: punappunaṃ deve vassante udakamagge pūretvā gāvutaḍḍhayojanamattaṃ ottharitvā udakaṃ tiṭṭheyya tato tato vissandamānaṃ,
atk-s0302a:299_3: atha niddhamanatumbe vivaritvā khettesu kamme kariyamāne udakaṃ nikkhamantaṃ,
atk-s0302a:299_4: sassapākakāle (udakaṃ nikkhamantaṃ,) udakaṃ parihīnaṃ “macche gaṇhāmā”ti vattabbataṃ āpajjeyya,
atk-s0302a:300_0: Paṭhamaṃ deve vassante pañcahi maggehi udake pavisante āvāṭānaṃ pūraṇakālo viya hi paṭhamameva paṭisandhikkhaṇe
atk-s0302a:300_2: punappunaṃ deve vassante pañcannaṃ maggānaṃ pūritakālo viya pavatte pañcadvārikavedanāya pavattikālo,
atk-s0302a:300_3: gāvutaḍḍhayojanamattaṃ ajjhottharaṇaṃ viya paṭhamavaye vīsativassakāle rajjanādivasena tassā adhimattabalavabhāvo,
atk-s0302a:300_5: tāva pūrāya vāpiyā ṭhitakālo viya paññāsavassakāle tassā ṭhitakālo,
atk-s0302a:300_6: niddhamanatumbesu vivaṭesu kammante kariyamāne udakassa nikkhamanakālo viya saṭṭhivassakālato paṭṭhāya tassā parihāni,
atk-s0302a:300_7: udake bhaṭṭhe udakamaggesu parittodakassa ṭhitakālo viya asītinavutivassakāle pañcadvārikavedanāya mandakālo,
atk-s0302a:300_8: āvāṭesuyeva udakassa patiṭṭhānakālo viya hadayavatthukoṭiṃ nissāya manodvārikavedanāya pavattikālo,
atk-s0302a:300_9: āvāṭesu parittepi udake sati “vāpiyaṃ udakaṃ atthī”ti vattabbakālo viya yāva sā pavattati,
atk-s0302a:300_11: Yathā pana āvāṭesu udake chinne “natthi vāpiyaṃ udaka”nti vuccati,
atk-s0302a:300_13: Imaṃ vedanaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ “jīvitapariyantikaṃ vedanaṃ vediyamāno”ti.
atk-s0302a:302_5: ādittakumbhakārapāko viya hi tayo bhavā daṭṭhabbā,
atk-s0302a:302_9: daṇḍakena uṇhakumbhaṃ ākaḍḍhitvā same bhūmibhāge kumbhassa ṭhapitakālo viya āraddhavipassakassa rūpasattakaṃ
atk-s0302a:302_10: arūpasattakaṃ vipassantassa kammaṭṭhāne ca paguṇe vibhūte upaṭṭhahamāne tathārūpaṃ utusappāyādiṃ labhitvā
atk-s0302a:302_11: ekāsane nisinnassa vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā aggaphalaṃ arahattaṃ patvā catūhi apāyehi attabhāvaṃ uddharitvā
atk-s0302a:302_13: Khīṇāsavo pana uṇhakumbho viya arahattappattadivaseyeva na parinibbāti,
atk-s0302a:302_14: sāsanappaveṇiṃ pana ghaṭayamāno paṇṇāsasaṭṭhivassāni ṭhatvā carimakacittappattiyā upādiṇṇakakkhandhabhedā anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāti.
atk-s0302a:302_15: Athassa kumbhassa viya kapallāni anupādiṇṇakasarīrāneva avasissantīti.
atk-s0302a:302_16: Sarīrāni avasissantīti pajānātīti idaṃ pana khīṇāsavassa anuyogāropanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:303_2: Evametanti yadetaṃ tividhe abhisaṅkhāre asati paṭisandhiviññāṇassa appaññāṇantiādi,
atk-s0302a:303_5: Esevanto dukkhassāti ayameva vaṭṭadukkhassa anto ayaṃ paricchedo,
atk-s0302a:305_1: Dutiye upādāniyesūti catunnaṃ upādānānaṃ paccayesu tebhūmakadhammesu.
atk-s0302a:305_6: Evameva khoti ettha aggikkhandho viya hi tayo bhavā,
atk-s0302a:305_9: sukkhatiṇagomayādipakkhipanaṃ viya assādānupassino puthujjanassa taṇhādivasena chahi dvārehi kusalākusalakammakaraṇaṃ.
atk-s0302a:305_10: Tiṇagomayādīsu khīṇesu punappunaṃ tesaṃ pakkhipanena aggikkhandhassa vaḍḍhanaṃ viya bālaputhujjanassa
atk-s0302a:306_0: Na kālena kālaṃ sukkhāni ceva tiṇāni pakkhipeyyāti tañhi koci atthakāmo evaṃ vadeyya –
atk-s0302a:306_1: “bho kasmā uṭṭhāya samuṭṭhāya kalāpe bandhitvā sukkhatiṇakaṭṭhānaṃ pacchiyañca pūretvā sukkhagomayāni pakkhipanto etaṃ aggiṃ jālesi?
atk-s0302a:306_2: Api nu te atthi itonidānaṃ kāci vaḍḍhīti?
atk-s0302a:306_6: Ahañhi imaṃ aggiṃ jagganto neva nhāyituṃ na bhuñjituṃ na nipajjituṃ labhāmīti.
atk-s0302a:306_7: Tena hi bho kiṃ te iminā niratthakena aggijālanena?
atk-s0302a:306_8: Ehi tvaṃ etāni ābhatāni tiṇādīni ettha nikkhipa,
atk-s0302a:306_10: tvaṃ pana asukasmiṃ ṭhāne sītodakā pokkharaṇī atthi,
atk-s0302a:306_12: mālāgandhavilepanehi attānaṃ maṇḍetvā sunivattho supārutova pādukāhi nagaraṃ pavisitvā pāsādavaramāruyha
atk-s0302a:306_13: vātapānaṃ vivaritvā mahāvīthiyaṃ virocamāno nisīda ekaggo sukhasamappito hutvā,
atk-s0302a:306_14: tattha te nisinnassa tiṇādīnaṃ khayena sayameva ayaṃ aggi appaṇṇattibhāvaṃ gamissatī”ti.
atk-s0302a:306_16: Tatheva ca tattha nisinnassa so aggi upādānakkhayena appaṇṇattibhāvaṃ gaccheyya.
atk-s0302a:307_0: Evameva khoti ettha pana idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ –
atk-s0302a:307_1: cattālīsāya kaṭṭhavāhānaṃ jalamāno mahāaggikkhandho viya hi tebhūmakavaṭṭaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ,
atk-s0302a:307_4: tena purisena tassa dinnaovādo viya tathāgatena “ehi tvaṃ, bhikkhu,
atk-s0302a:307_6: evaṃ vaṭṭadukkhā muccissasī”ti tassa tebhūmakadhammesu kammaṭṭhānassa kathitakālo,
atk-s0302a:307_7: tassa purisassa yathānusiṭṭhaṃ paṭipajjitvā pāsāde nisinnakālo viya yogino sugatovādaṃ sampaṭicchitvā
atk-s0302a:307_8: suññāgāraṃ paviṭṭhassa tebhūmakadhammesu vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā anukkamena yathānurūpaṃ āhārasappāyādiṃ labhitvā,
atk-s0302a:307_10: tassa nhānavilepanādīhi sudhotamaṇḍitakāyattā tasmiṃ nisinnassa ekaggasukhasamappitakālo viya yogino
atk-s0302a:307_11: ariyamaggapokkharaṇiyaṃ maggañāṇodakena sunhātasudhotakilesamalassa hirottappasāṭake nivāsetvā sīlavilepanānulittassa
atk-s0302a:307_12: arahattamaṇḍanena attabhāvaṃ maṇḍetvā vimuttipupphadāmaṃ piḷandhitvā iddhipādapādukā āruyha nibbānanagaraṃ
atk-s0302a:307_13: pavisitvā dhammapāsādaṃ āruyha satipaṭṭhānamahāvīthiyaṃ virocamānassa nibbānārammaṇaṃ phalasamāpattiṃ
atk-s0302a:307_15: Tassa pana purisassa tasmiṃ nisinnassa tiṇādīnaṃ khayena aggikkhandhassa appaṇṇattigamanakālo viya khīṇāsavassa
atk-s0302a:307_16: yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā upādiṇṇakakkhandhabhedena anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbutassa mahāvaṭṭavūpasamo
atk-s0302a:309_3: Telaṃ āsiñceyya vaṭṭiṃ upasaṃhareyyāti dīpapaṭijagganatthaṃ telabhājanañca mahantañca vaṭṭikapālaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0302a:309_4: samīpe niccaṃ ṭhitova tele khīṇe telaṃ āsiñceyya,
atk-s0302a:309_6: Sesamettha saddhiṃ opammasaṃsandanena purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Tatiyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:311_0: 54. Catutthe upamaṃ paṭhamaṃ katvā pacchā attho vutto. Sesaṃ tādisameva. Catutthaṃ.
atk-s0302a:313_1: Pañcame uddhaṃ ojaṃ abhiharantīti pathavīrasañca āporasañca upari āropenti.
atk-s0302a:313_2: Ojāya āropitattā hatthasatubbedhassa rukkhassa aṅkuraggesu bindubindūni viya hutvā sineho tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0302a:313_6: mūlehi ojāya ārohanaṃ viya chahi dvārehi kammārohanaṃ,
atk-s0302a:313_7: ojāya abhiruḷhattā mahārukkhassa yāvakappaṭṭhānaṃ viya vaṭṭanissitabālaputhujjanassa chahi dvārehi kammaṃ
atk-s0302a:313_8: āyūhantassa aparāparaṃ vaṭṭassa vaḍḍhanavasena dīgharattaṃ ṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0302a:314_1: Khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ chindeyyāti khuddakamahantāni khaṇḍākhaṇḍāni karonto chindeyya.
atk-s0302a:314_8: rukkhassa mūle chinnakālo viya yogino ācariyasantike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā manasikarontassa paññā,
atk-s0302a:314_9: khaṇḍākhaṇḍikaṃ chindanakālo viya saṅkhepato catunnaṃ mahābhūtānaṃ manasikāro,
atk-s0302a:314_11: sakalikaṃ sakalikaṃ karaṇakālo viya upādārūpassa ceva rūpakkhandhārammaṇassa viññāṇassa cāti imesaṃ vasena nāmarūpapariggaho,
atk-s0302a:314_12: mūlānaṃ upacchedanaṃ viya tasseva nāmarūpassa paccayapariyesanaṃ,
atk-s0302a:314_13: vātātape visosetvā agginā ḍahanakālo viya anupubbena vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā aññataraṃ sappāyaṃ labhitvā
atk-s0302a:314_14: kammaṭṭhāne vibhūte upaṭṭhahamāne ekapallaṅke nisinnassa samaṇadhammaṃ karontassa aggaphalappatti,
atk-s0302a:314_15: masikaraṇaṃ viya arahattappattadivaseyeva aparinibbāyantassa yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhita kālo,
atk-s0302a:314_16: mahāvāte opunanaṃ nadiyā pavāhanaṃ viya ca upādiṇṇakakkhandhabhedena anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbutassa vaṭṭavūpasamo veditabbo. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:316_0: 56. Chaṭṭhepi upamaṃ paṭhamaṃ vatvā pacchā attho vutto, idameva nānattaṃ. Chaṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0302a:318_3: Paṃsuṃ dadeyyāti thaddhapharusapaṃsuṃ haritvā mudugomayacuṇṇamissaṃ madhurapaṃsuṃ pakkhipeyya.
atk-s0302a:318_10: rukkhassa vuḍḍhiāpajjanaṃ viya puthujjanassa tīhi dvārehi kammaṃ āyūhato aparāparaṃ vaṭṭappavatti.
atk-s0302a:320_1: Dasame kurūsu viharatīti kurūti evaṃ bahuvacanavasena laddhavohāre janapade viharati.
atk-s0302a:320_2: Kammāsadhammaṃ nāma kurūnaṃ nigamoti evaṃnāmako kurūnaṃ nigamo,
atk-s0302a:320_6: Ekamantaṃ nisīdīti cha nisajjadose vivajjento dakkhiṇajāṇumaṇḍalassa abhimukhaṭṭhāne chabbaṇṇānaṃ buddharasmīnaṃ
atk-s0302a:320_7: anto pavisitvā pasannalākhārasaṃ vigāhanto viya suvaṇṇapaṭaṃ pārupanto viya rattakambalavitānamajjhaṃ
atk-s0302a:320_8: pavisanto viya dhammabhaṇḍāgāriko āyasmā ānando nisīdi.
atk-s0302a:321_0: Kāya pana velāya kena kāraṇena ayamāyasmā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamantoti?
atk-s0302a:321_2: Taṃ divasaṃ kira ayamāyasmā kulasaṅgahatthāya gharadvāre gharadvāre sahassabhaṇḍikaṃ nikkhipanto viya
atk-s0302a:321_3: kammāsadhammaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto satthu vattaṃ dassetvā satthari gandhakuṭiṃ paviṭṭhe
atk-s0302a:321_4: satthāraṃ vanditvā attano divāṭṭhānaṃ gantvā antevāsikesu vattaṃ dassetvā paṭikkantesu divāṭṭhānaṃ paṭisammajjitvā
atk-s0302a:321_5: cammakkhaṇḍaṃ paññapetvā udakatumbato udakena hatthapāde sītalaṃ katvā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisinno sotāpattiphalasamāpattiṃ
atk-s0302a:321_7: Atha paricchinnakālavasena samāpattito vuṭṭhāya paccayākāre ñāṇaṃ otāresi.
atk-s0302a:321_11: majjhato paṭṭhāya ubho ante pāpento tikkhattuṃ dvādasapadaṃ paccayākāraṃ sammasi.
atk-s0302a:321_12: Tassevaṃ sammasantassa paccayākāro vibhūto hutvā uttānakuttānako viya upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0302a:321_14: “ayaṃ paccayākāro sabbabuddhehi gambhīro ceva gambhīrāvabhāso cāti kathito,
atk-s0302a:321_15: mayhaṃ kho pana padesañāṇe ṭhitassa sāvakassa sato uttāno viya vibhūto pākaṭo hutvā upaṭṭhāti,
atk-s0302a:321_16: mayhaṃyeva nu kho esa uttānako viya upaṭṭhāti,
atk-s0302a:321_17: udāhu aññesampīti attano upaṭṭhānakāraṇaṃ satthu ārocessāmī”ti nisinnaṭṭhānato uṭṭhāya cammakkhaṇḍaṃ
atk-s0302a:322_5: Ekañhi uttānameva gambhīrāvabhāsaṃ hoti pūtipaṇṇarasavasena kāḷavaṇṇaṃ purāṇaudakaṃ viya.
atk-s0302a:322_7: Ekaṃ gambhīraṃ uttānāvabhāsaṃ hoti maṇibhāsaṃ vippasannaudakaṃ viya.
atk-s0302a:322_9: Ekaṃ uttānaṃ uttānāvabhāsaṃ hoti pātiādīsu udakaṃ viya.
atk-s0302a:322_10: Ekaṃ gambhīraṃ gambhīrāvabhāsaṃ hoti sinerupādakamahāsamudde udakaṃ viya.
atk-s0302a:322_13: Ayañhi gambhīro ca gambhīrāvabhāso cāti ekameva nāmaṃ labhati.
atk-s0302a:322_14: Evarūpo samānopi atha ca pana me uttānakuttānako viya khāyati,
atk-s0302a:322_16: bhanteti evaṃ attano vimhayaṃ pakāsento pañhaṃ pucchitvā tuṇhībhūto nisīdi.
atk-s0302a:323_0: Bhagavā tassa vacanaṃ sutvā “ānando bhavaggagahaṇāya hatthaṃ pasārento viya sineruṃ bhinditvā miñjaṃ
atk-s0302a:323_1: nīharituṃ vāyamamāno viya vinā nāvāya mahāsamuddaṃ taritukāmo viya pathaviṃ parivattetvā pathavojaṃ gahetuṃ
atk-s0302a:323_2: vāyamamāno viya buddhavisayaṃ pañhaṃ attano uttānuttānanti vadati,
atk-s0302a:323_3: handassa gambhīrabhāvaṃ ācikkhāmī”ti cintetvā mā hevantiādimāha.
atk-s0302a:324_3: “Mā heva”nti ca idaṃ vacanaṃ bhagavā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ussādentopi bhaṇati apasādentopi.
atk-s0302a:324_6: tena te gambhīropi paṭiccasamuppādo uttānako viya khāyati,
atk-s0302a:325_1: cha māse subhojanarasapuṭṭhassa kira katayogassa mahāmallassa samajjasamaye katamallapāsāṇaparicayassa
atk-s0302a:325_6: “Ukkhipituṃ na sakkomā”ti vutte sayaṃ gantvā “kuhiṃ imassa bhāriyaṭṭhāna”nti vatvā dvīhi hatthehi dve
atk-s0302a:325_7: pāsāṇe ukkhipitvā kīḷāguḷe viya khipitvā agamāsi.
atk-s0302a:325_8: Tattha mallassa mallapāsāṇo lahukoti na aññesampi lahukoti vattabbo.
atk-s0302a:325_9: Cha māse subhojanarasapuṭṭho mallo viya hi kappasatasahassaṃ abhinīhārasampanno āyasmā ānando.
atk-s0302a:325_11: evaṃ therassa mahāpaññatāya paṭiccasamuppādo uttānoti vattabbo,
atk-s0302a:326_0: Mahāsamudde ca timi nāma mahāmaccho dviyojanasatiko,
atk-s0302a:326_3: ānando timinando ajjhāroho mahātimīti ime cattāro yojanasahassikā.
atk-s0302a:326_5: Tassa kira dakkhiṇakaṇṇaṃ cālentassa pañcayojanasate padese udakaṃ calati,
atk-s0302a:326_9: Dve pana kaṇṇe cāletvā naṅguṭṭhena paharitvā sīsaṃ aparāparaṃ katvā kīḷituṃ āraddhassa sattaṭṭhayojanasate
atk-s0302a:326_10: ṭhāne bhājane pakkhipitvā uddhane āropitaṃ viya udakaṃ pakkuthati.
atk-s0302a:326_11: Yojanasatamatte padese udakaṃ piṭṭhiṃ chādetuṃ na sakkoti.
atk-s0302a:326_16: Tattha kāyūpapannassa timirapiṅgalassa mahāsamuddo uttānoti aññesañca khuddakamacchānaṃ uttānoti na vattabbo,
atk-s0302a:326_17: evameva ñāṇūpapannassa therassa paṭiccasamuppādo uttānoti aññesampi uttānoti na vattabbo.
atk-s0302a:326_25: tasmiṃ supaṇṇavātaṃ dassetuṃ āraddhe sattaṭṭhayojanasataṃ ṭhānaṃ nappahoti.
atk-s0302a:326_30: Tattha kāyūpapannassa supaṇṇarañño ākāso parittoti aññesañca khuddakapakkhīnaṃ parittoti na vattabbo,
atk-s0302a:326_31: evameva ñāṇūpapannassa therassa paṭiccasamuppādo uttānoti aññesampi uttānoti na vattabbo.
atk-s0302a:327_0: Rāhu asurindo pana pādantato yāva kesantā yojanānaṃ cattāri sahassāni aṭṭha ca satāni honti.
atk-s0302a:327_9: Tassa mahāsamuddaṃ otiṇṇassa gambhīraṃ udakaṃ jāṇuppamāṇaṃ hoti.
atk-s0302a:327_14: Tattha kāyūpapannassa rāhuno mahāsamuddo uttānoti aññesañca uttānoti na vattabbo.
atk-s0302a:327_15: Evameva ñāṇūpapannassa therassa paṭiccasamuppādo uttānoti aññesampi uttānoti na vattabbo.
atk-s0302a:327_16: Etamatthaṃ sandhāya bhagavā mā hevaṃ, ānanda, mā hevaṃ,
atk-s0302a:328_0: Therassa hi catūhi kāraṇehi gambhīro paṭiccasamuppādo uttānoti upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0302a:329_0: Ito kira satasahassime kappe padumuttaro nāma satthā loke uppajji.
atk-s0302a:329_5: So puttassa jātadivase mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamma pabbajitvā padhānamanuyutto anukkamena sabbaññutaṃ patvā,
atk-s0302a:329_6: “anekajātisaṃsāra”nti udānaṃ udānetvā sattāhaṃ bodhipallaṅke vītināmetvā “pathaviyaṃ pādaṃ ṭhapessāmī”ti pādaṃ abhinīhari.
atk-s0302a:329_7: Atha pathaviṃ bhinditvā mahantaṃ padumaṃ uṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0302a:330_4: Tassa ekādasahatthena pādena dvādasahatthāya kaṇṇikāya akkantamattāya navaghaṭappamāṇā reṇu uṭṭhāya aṭṭhapaññāsahatthaṃ
atk-s0302a:330_7: Tassa devilo ca sujāto ca dve aggasāvakā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0302a:330_8: amitā ca asamā ca dve aggasāvikā,
atk-s0302a:330_10: Padumuttaro bhagavā pitusaṅgahaṃ kurumāno bhikkhusatasahassaparivāro haṃsavatiyā rājadhāniyā vasati.
atk-s0302a:331_1: Tassa rājā haṃsavatito vīsayojanasate bhogaṃ adāsi.
atk-s0302a:331_2: So kadāci āgantvā pitarañca satthārañca passati.
atk-s0302a:331_9: Rājā tuṭṭho “sīghaṃ mama putto āgacchatū”ti āha.
atk-s0302a:331_12: “mayhaṃ pitā tuṭṭho sace me varaṃ deti,
atk-s0302a:331_22: tasmā deve varaṃ dadamāne temāsaṃ padumuttaraṃ bhagavantaṃ upaṭṭhātuṃ varaṃ gaṇhathā”ti.
atk-s0302a:331_30: bhagavantaṃ temāsaṃ catūhi paccayehi upaṭṭhahanto jīvitaṃ avañjhaṃ kātuṃ,
atk-s0302a:331_31: idaṃ me varaṃ dehī”ti āha. Na sakkā, tāta,
atk-s0302a:331_39: ahaṃ bhagavato cittaṃ jānissāmī”ti vihāraṃ gato.
atk-s0302a:332_0: Tena ca samayena bhattakiccaṃ niṭṭhāpetvā bhagavā gandhakuṭiṃ paviṭṭho hoti.
atk-s0302a:332_1: So maṇḍalamāḷe sannisinnānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ santikaṃ agamāsi.
atk-s0302a:332_8: icchiticchitakkhaṇe satthāraṃ daṭṭhuṃ labhāmā”ti. Ko pana, bhante,
atk-s0302a:332_17: rājaputtā”ti taṃ gahetvā gandhakuṭipariveṇe ṭhapetvā gandhakuṭiṃ āruhi.
atk-s0302a:332_28: bhikkhū pana “na mayaṃ icchiticchitakkhaṇe bhagavantaṃ daṭṭhuṃ labhāmā”ti maṃ therassa santikaṃ pāhesuṃ,
atk-s0302a:332_29: thero pana ekavacaneneva dassesi, thero, bhante,
atk-s0302a:332_32: vallabho esa bhikkhu mayhaṃ sāsaneti. Bhante,
atk-s0302a:332_33: buddhānaṃ sāsane kiṃ katvā vallabho hotīti?
atk-s0302a:332_34: Dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ samādiyitvā uposathakammaṃ katvā, kumārāti.
atk-s0302a:332_35: Bhagavā ahampi thero viya buddhasāsane vallabho hotukāmo,
atk-s0302a:332_37: “atthi nu kho gatena attho”ti oloketvā “atthī”ti disvā “suññāgāre kho,
atk-s0302a:332_43: mayā pesite bhikkhusatasahassena saddhiṃ āgacchathā”ti paṭiññaṃ gahetvā pitu santikaṃ gantvā,
atk-s0302a:332_46: mayā pahite tumhe bhagavantaṃ peseyyāthā”ti pitaraṃ vanditvā nikkhamitvā yojane yojane vihāraṃ kāretvā vīsayojanasataṃ addhānaṃ gato.
atk-s0302a:332_47: Gantvā attano nagare vihāraṭṭhānaṃ vicinanto sobhanassa nāma kuṭumbikassa uyyānaṃ disvā satasahassena kiṇitvā satasahassaṃ vissajjetvā vihāraṃ kāresi.
atk-s0302a:332_49: sesabhikkhūnañca rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānatthāya kuṭileṇamaṇḍape kārāpetvā pākāraparikkhepaṃ dvārakoṭṭhakañca
atk-s0302a:332_50: niṭṭhāpetvā pitu santikaṃ pesesi “niṭṭhitaṃ mayhaṃ kiccaṃ,
atk-s0302a:333_0: Rājā bhagavantaṃ bhojetvā “bhagavā sumanassa kiccaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ,
atk-s0302a:333_2: Bhagavā satasahassabhikkhuparivāro yojane yojane vihāresu vasamāno agamāsi.
atk-s0302a:333_3: Kumāro “satthā āgacchatī”ti sutvā yojanaṃ paccuggantvā gandhamālādīhi pūjayamāno vihāraṃ pavesetvā –
atk-s0302a:336_1: So vassūpanāyikadivase dānaṃ datvā attano puttadāre ca amacce ca pakkosāpetvā āha –“satthā amhākaṃ santikaṃ dūrato āgato,
atk-s0302a:336_4: Tasmā ahaṃ imaṃ temāsaṃ dve sāṭake nivāsetvā dasa sīlāni samādiyitvā idheva vasissāmi,
atk-s0302a:336_5: tumhe khīṇāsavasatasahassassa imināva nīhārena temāsaṃ dānaṃ dadeyyāthā”ti.
atk-s0302a:337_0: So sumanattherassa vasanaṭṭhānasabhāgeyeva ṭhāne vasanto yaṃ thero bhagavato vattaṃ karoti,
atk-s0302a:337_4: upakaṭṭhāya pavāraṇāya gāmaṃ pavisitvā sattāhaṃ mahādānaṃ datvā sattame divase bhikkhūsatasahassassa
atk-s0302a:337_6: yadetaṃ mayā magge yojanantarikavihārakārāpanato paṭṭhāya puññaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0302a:337_10: Tasmā ahampi bhagavā anāgate sumanatthero viya ekassa buddhassa upaṭṭhāko homī”ti pañcapatiṭṭhitena patitvā vanditvā nipanno.
atk-s0302a:337_14: “anāgate ito satasahassime kappe gotamo nāma buddho uppajjissati,
atk-s0302a:339_0: Sabbe pūrentu saṅkappā, cando pannaraso yathā”ti. –
atk-s0302a:340_1: Kumāro sutvā “buddhā nāma advejjhakathā hontī”ti dutiyadivaseyeva tassa bhagavato pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā piṭṭhito piṭṭhito gacchanto viya ahosi.
atk-s0302a:340_2: So tasmiṃ buddhuppāde vassasatasahassaṃ dānaṃ datvā sagge nibbattitvā kassapabuddhakālepi piṇḍāya carato
atk-s0302a:340_3: therassa pattaggahaṇatthaṃ uttarisāṭakaṃ datvā pūjaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0302a:340_4: Puna sagge nibbattitvā tato cuto bārāṇasirājā hutvā aṭṭhannaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ paṇṇasālāyo kāretvā maṇiādhārake
atk-s0302a:340_5: upaṭṭhapetvā catūhi paccayehi dasavassasahassāni upaṭṭhānaṃ akāsi.
atk-s0302a:341_0: Kappasatasahassaṃ pana dānaṃ dadamānova amhākaṃ bodhisattena saddhiṃ tusitapure nibbattitvā tato cuto
atk-s0302a:341_1: amitodanasakkassa gehe paṭisandhiṃ gahetvā anupubbena katābhinikkhamano sammāsambodhiṃ patvā paṭhamagamanena
atk-s0302a:341_2: kapilavatthuṃ āgantvā tato nikkhamante bhagavati bhagavato parivāratthaṃ rājakumāresu pabbajantesu bhaddiyādīhi
atk-s0302a:341_3: saddhiṃ nikkhamitvā bhagavato santike pabbajitvā nacirasseva āyasmato puṇṇassa mantāṇiputtassa santike
atk-s0302a:341_6: tassimāya pubbūpanissayasampattiyā gambhīropi paṭiccasamuppādo uttānako viya upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0302a:342_0: Titthavāsoti pana garūnaṃ santike uggahaṇasavanaparipucchanadhāraṇāni vuccanti.
atk-s0302a:342_3: Sotāpannānañca nāma paccayākāro uttānako hutvā upaṭṭhāti,
atk-s0302a:342_5: Bahussutānaṃ catuhatthe ovarake padīpe jalamāne mañcapīṭhaṃ viya nāmarūpaparicchedo pākaṭo hoti,
atk-s0302a:342_7: Iti bāhusaccabhāvenapissa gambhīropi paccayākāro uttānako viya upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0302a:342_10: Sā sabbāpi therassa uttānakā viya upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0302a:342_11: Tena bhagavā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ ussādento mā hevantiādimāha.
atk-s0302a:342_14: tena te gambhīropi paṭiccasamuppādo uttānako viya khāyati.
atk-s0302a:342_15: Tasmā “mayhameva nu kho esa uttānako viya hutvā upaṭṭhāti,
atk-s0302a:343_2: “atha ca pana me uttānakuttānako viya khāyatī”ti mā hevaṃ avaca.
atk-s0302a:343_3: Yadi hi te esa uttānakuttānako viya khāyati,
atk-s0302a:343_4: kasmā tvaṃ attano dhammatāya sotāpanno nāhosi,
atk-s0302a:343_5: mayā dinnanaye ṭhatvā sotāpattimaggaṃ paṭivijjhi? Ānanda,
atk-s0302a:343_8: atha kasmā oḷārikaṃ kāmarāgasaṃyojanaṃ paṭighasaṃyojanaṃ oḷārikaṃ kāmarāgānusayaṃ paṭighānusayanti ime
atk-s0302a:343_9: cattāro kilese samugghātetvā sakadāgāmiphalaṃ na sacchikarosi,
atk-s0302a:343_10: teyeva aṇusahagate cattāro kilese samugghātetvā anāgāmiphalaṃ na sacchikarosi,
atk-s0302a:343_12: mānānusayaṃ bhavarāgānusayaṃ avijjānusayanti ime aṭṭha kilese samugghātetvā arahattaṃ na sacchikarosi?
atk-s0302a:343_13: Kasmā vā satasahassakappādhikaṃ ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ pūritapāramino sāriputtamoggallānā viya sāvakapāramīñāṇaṃ na paṭivijjhasi,
atk-s0302a:343_14: satasahassakappādhikāni dve asaṅkhyeyyāni pūritapāramino paccekabuddhā viya ca paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ na paṭivijjhasi?
atk-s0302a:343_15: Yadi vā te sabbathāva esa uttānako hutvā upaṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0302a:343_16: Atha kasmā satasahassakappādhikāni cattāri aṭṭha soḷasa vā asaṅkhyeyyāni pūritapāramino buddhā viya sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ na sacchikarosi?
atk-s0302a:343_19: tvaṃ nāma sāvakapadesañāṇe ṭhito atigambhīraṃ paccayākāraṃ “uttānako viya me upaṭṭhātī”ti vadasi.
atk-s0302a:343_20: Tassa te idaṃ vacanaṃ buddhānaṃ kathāya paccanīkaṃ hoti.
atk-s0302a:343_21: Tādisena nāma bhikkhunā buddhānaṃ kathāya paccanīkaṃ kathetabbanti na yuttametaṃ.
atk-s0302a:343_23: imaṃ paccayākāraṃ paṭivijjhituṃ vāyamantasseva kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni atikkantāni.
atk-s0302a:343_24: Paccayākārapaṭivijjhanatthāya ca pana me adinnadānaṃ nāma natthi,
atk-s0302a:343_26: “Ajja paccayākāraṃ paṭivijjhissāmī”ti pana me nirussāhaṃ viya mārabalaṃ vidhamantassa ayaṃ mahāpathavī dvaṅgulamattampi nākampi,
atk-s0302a:343_30: “avijjā saṅkhārānaṃ navahi ākārehi paccayo hotī”ti diṭṭhamatteyeva dasasahassilokadhātu ayadaṇḍena ākoṭitakaṃsathālo
atk-s0302a:343_31: viya viravasataṃ viravasahassaṃ muñcamānā vātāhate paduminipaṇṇe udakabindu viya pakampittha.
atk-s0302a:344_4: Yathā nāma dunnikkhittaṃ mūsikacchinnaṃ pesakārānaṃ tantaṃ tahiṃ tahiṃ ākulaṃ hoti,
atk-s0302a:344_7: mūlena vā mūlaṃ samānetuṃ dukkaraṃ hoti.
atk-s0302a:344_8: Evameva sattā imasmiṃ paccayākāre khalitā ākulā byākulā honti,
atk-s0302a:344_10: Tattha tantaṃ paccattapurisakāre ṭhatvā sakkāpi bhaveyya ujuṃ kātuṃ,
atk-s0302a:344_11: ṭhapetvā pana dve bodhisatte añño satto attano dhammatāya paccayākāraṃ ujuṃ kātuṃ samattho nāma natthi.
atk-s0302a:344_12: Yathā pana ākulaṃ tantaṃ kañjiyaṃ datvā kocchena pahaṭaṃ tattha tattha guḷakajātaṃ hoti gaṇṭhibaddhaṃ,
atk-s0302a:344_13: evamime sattā paccayesu pakkhalitvā paccaye ujuṃ kātuṃ asakkontā dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhigatavasena guḷakajātā honti gaṇṭhibaddhā.
atk-s0302a:344_15: sabbe te paccayaṃ ujuṃ kātuṃ asakkontāyeva.
atk-s0302a:345_3: Yathā hi tadubhayampi ākulaṃ aggena vā aggaṃ,
atk-s0302a:345_4: mūlena vā mūlaṃ samānetuṃ dukkaranti purimanayeneva yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:346_0: Muñjapabbajabhūtāti muñjatiṇaṃ viya pabbajatiṇaṃ viya ca bhūtā tādisā jātā.
atk-s0302a:346_1: Yathā hi tāni tiṇāni koṭṭetvā katarajju jiṇṇakāle katthaci patitaṃ gahetvā tesaṃ tiṇānaṃ “idaṃ aggaṃ,
atk-s0302a:346_4: tampi paccattapurisakāre ṭhatvā sakkā bhaveyya ujuṃ kātuṃ,
atk-s0302a:346_5: ṭhapetvā pana dve bodhisatte añño satto attano dhammatāya paccayākāraṃ ujuṃ kātuṃ samattho nāma natthi,
atk-s0302a:346_6: evamayaṃ pajā paccayaṃ ujuṃ kātuṃ asakkontī diṭṭhigatavasena gaṇṭhikajātā hutvā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ saṃsāraṃ nātivattati.
atk-s0302a:347_1: Sabbepi hi te vaḍḍhisaṅkhātassa ayassa abhāvato “apāyo”ti vuccati,
atk-s0302a:350_2: paṭisandhito cutinti evaṃ punappunaṃ cutipaṭisandhiyo gaṇhamānā tīsu bhavesu catūsu yonīsu pañcasu gatīsu
atk-s0302a:350_3: sattasu viññāṇaṭṭhitīsu navasu sattāvāsesu mahāsamudde vātakkhittā nāvā viya yante yuttagoṇo viya ca
atk-s0302a:350_5: Iti sabbametaṃ bhagavā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ apasādento āha.
atk-s0302a:354_2: Puthujjanoti puthūnaṃ nānappakārānaṃ kilesādīnaṃ jananādikāraṇehi puthujjano.
atk-s0302a:354_5: Apica puthūnaṃ gaṇanapathamatītānaṃ ariyadhammaparammukhānaṃ nīcadhammasamācārānaṃ janānaṃ antogadhattāpi puthujjano,
atk-s0302a:354_6: puthu vā ayaṃ visuṃyeva saṅkhaṃ gato,
atk-s0302a:354_8: Evametehi “assutavā puthujjano”ti dvīhipi padehi ye te –
atk-s0302a:357_3: Cātumahābhūtikasminti catumahābhūtakāye catumahābhūtehi nibbatte catumahābhūtamayeti attho.
atk-s0302a:358_0: Tasmāti yasmā ime cattāro vuḍḍhihāninibbattibhedā paññāyanti,
atk-s0302a:358_2: Iti bhagavā cātumahābhūtike kāye rūpaṃ pariggahetuṃ ayuttarūpaṃ katvā arūpaṃ pariggahetuṃ yuttarūpaṃ karoti. Kasmā?
atk-s0302a:358_3: Tesañhi bhikkhūnaṃ rūpasmiṃ gāho balavā adhimatto,
atk-s0302a:358_4: tena tesaṃ rūpe gāhassa pariggahetabbarūpataṃ dassetvā nikkaḍḍhanto arūpe patiṭṭhāpanatthaṃ evamāha.
atk-s0302a:359_1: Tañhi cittavatthutāya cittagocaratāya sampayuttadhammacittatāya ca cittaṃ,
atk-s0302a:360_2: Paṭhamañhi tena rūpaṃ pariggahetuṃ ayuttarūpaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0302a:360_4: atha “tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ rūpato gāho nikkhamitvā arūpaṃ gato”ti ñatvā taṃ nikkaḍḍhituṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0302a:360_8: Kiṃ atirekavassasataṃ tiṭṭhamānaṃ rūpaṃ nāma atthi?
atk-s0302a:360_9: Nanu paṭhamavaye pavattaṃ rūpaṃ majjhimavayaṃ na pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0302a:360_23: tattha tattheva odhi odhi pabbaṃ pabbaṃ hutvā tattakapāle pakkhittatilā viya paṭapaṭāyantā saṅkhārā bhijjantīti?
atk-s0302a:360_25: Yathā pana padīpassa jalato jātā taṃ taṃ vaṭṭippadesaṃ anatikkamitvā tattha tattheva bhijjati,
atk-s0302a:360_26: atha ca pana paveṇisambandhavasena sabbarattiṃ jalito padīpoti vuccati,
atk-s0302a:360_27: evamidhāpi paveṇivasena ayampi kāyo evaṃ ciraṭṭhitiko viya katvā dassito.
atk-s0302a:361_0: Rattiyā ca divasassa cāti rattimhi ca divase ca.
atk-s0302a:361_3: aññaṃ nirujjhatīti yaṃ rattiṃ uppajjati ca nirujjhati ca,
atk-s0302a:361_4: tato aññadeva divā uppajjati ca nirujjhati cāti attho.
atk-s0302a:361_6: anuppannameva aññaṃ nirujjhatīti evaṃ pana attho na gahetabbo.
atk-s0302a:361_7: “Rattiyā ca divasassa cā”ti idaṃ purimapaveṇito parittakaṃ paveṇiṃ gahetvā paveṇivaseneva vuttaṃ,
atk-s0302a:361_8: ekarattiṃ pana ekadivasaṃ vā ekameva cittaṃ ṭhātuṃ samatthaṃ nāma natthi.
atk-s0302a:362_4: ekaccharākkhaṇe pavattassa cittassa ettakā vīhī lakkhaṃ ṭhapīyamānā parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ gaccheyyu”nti.
atk-s0302a:363_2: taṃ muñcitvā aññaṃ gaṇhātīti iminā na so gaṇhitabbasākhaṃ alabhitvā bhūmiṃ otarati.
atk-s0302a:363_3: Atha kho tasmiṃ mahāvane vicaranto taṃ taṃ sākhaṃ gaṇhantoyeva caratīti ayamattho dassito.
atk-s0302a:364_2: Tasmiṃ vane vicaraṇamakkaṭo viya ārammaṇavane uppajjanakacittaṃ.
atk-s0302a:364_4: Yathā so araññe vicaranto makkaṭo taṃ taṃ sākhaṃ pahāya taṃ taṃ sākhaṃ gaṇhāti,
atk-s0302a:364_5: evamidaṃ ārammaṇavane vicarantaṃ cittampi kadāci rūpārammaṇaṃ gahetvā uppajjati,
atk-s0302a:364_11: Yathā ca so araññe vicaranto makkaṭo sākhaṃ alabhitvā oruyha bhūmiyaṃ nisinnoti na vattabbo,
atk-s0302a:364_13: evameva ārammaṇavane vicarantaṃ cittampi ekaṃ olubbhārammaṇaṃ alabhitvā uppannanti na vattabbaṃ,
atk-s0302a:364_14: ekajātiyaṃ pana ārammaṇaṃ gahetvāva uppajjatīti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:364_15: Ettāvatā ca pana bhagavatā rūpato nīharitvā arūpe gāho patiṭṭhāpito,
atk-s0302a:365_5: athassa visaṃ harissāmīti cheko bhisakko āgantvā vamanaṃ kāretvā heṭṭhā garuḷo,
atk-s0302a:365_6: upari nāgoti mantaṃ parivattetvā visaṃ upari āropesi.
atk-s0302a:365_7: So yāva akkhippadesā āruḷhabhāvaṃ ñatvā “ito paraṃ abhiruhituṃ na dassāmi,
atk-s0302a:365_9: heṭṭhā nāgoti mantaṃ parivattetvā kaṇṇe dhumetvā daṇḍakena paharitvā visaṃ otāretvā daṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva ṭhapesi.
atk-s0302a:365_10: Tatrassa ṭhitabhāvaṃ ñatvā agadalepena visaṃ nimmathetvā nhāpetvā “sukhī hohī”ti vatvā yenakāmaṃ pakkāmi.
atk-s0302a:366_0: Tattha āsīvisena daṭṭhassa kāye visapatiṭṭhānaṃ viya imesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ rūpe adhimattagāhakālo,
atk-s0302a:366_2: mantaṃ parivattetvā upari visassa āropitakālo viya tathāgatena tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ rūpato gāhaṃ nīharitvā arūpe patiṭṭhāpitakālo,
atk-s0302a:366_3: yāva akkhippadesā āruḷhavisassa upari abhiruhituṃ adatvā puna mantabalena otāretvā daṭṭhaṭṭhāneyeva ṭhapanaṃ
atk-s0302a:366_4: viya satthārā tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ arūpato gāhaṃ nīharitvā rūpe patiṭṭhāpitakālo.
atk-s0302a:366_5: Daṭṭhaṭṭhāne ṭhitassa visassa agadalepena nimmathanaṃ viya ubhayato gāhaṃ nīharaṇatthāya imissā desanāya āraddhakālo veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:366_6: Tattha nibbindaṃ virajjatīti iminā maggo kathito,
atk-s0302a:368_3: Nanu ca cakkhusamphasso sukhavedanāya paccayo na hotīti?
atk-s0302a:368_14: Tejo abhinibbattatīti aggicuṇṇo nikkhamatīti na gahetabbaṃ,
atk-s0302a:370_10: Sabbadisāsu hissa yamakamahāmegho vuṭṭhahitvā mahoghaṃ viya sabbapāramiyo “ekasmiṃ attabhāve vipākaṃ
atk-s0302a:370_17: Sakaṭasatehipi paccaye āharitvā okāsaṃ alabhamānā samantā gāvutappamāṇampi sakaṭadhurena sakaṭadhuraṃ
atk-s0302a:370_18: āhacca tiṭṭhanti ceva anuppavattanti ca andhakavindabrāhmaṇādayo viya.
atk-s0302a:370_19: Sabbaṃ khandhake tesu tesu suttesu ca āgatanayena veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:372_0: “Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā sakkato hoti garukato mānito pūjito apacito lābhī cīvara-
atk-s0302a:373_1: etarahi saṅgho vā gaṇo vā loke uppanno, nāhaṃ, cunda,
atk-s0302a:373_2: aññaṃ ekasaṅghampi samanupassāmi evaṃ lābhaggayasaggapattaṃ yatharivāyaṃ, cunda,
atk-s0302a:374_0: Svāyaṃ bhagavato ca saṅghassa ca uppanno lābhasakkāro ekato hutvā dvinnaṃ mahānadīnaṃ udakaṃ viya appameyyo ahosi.
atk-s0302a:374_4: Kiṃ nu kho bhikkhū āhārapariggāhakena satisampajaññena samannāgatā majjhattā nicchandarāgā hutvā āhāraṃ paribhuñjituṃ sakkonti,
atk-s0302a:375_0: So addasa ekacce adhunā pabbajite kulaputte apaccavekkhitvā āhāraṃ paribhuñjamāne.
atk-s0302a:375_2: “mayā kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni pāramiyo pūrentena na cīvarādihetu pūritā,
atk-s0302a:375_4: Imepi bhikkhū mama santike pabbajantā na cīvarādihetu pabbajitā,
atk-s0302a:375_6: Te idāni asārameva sāraṃ anatthameva ca atthaṃ karontī”ti evamassa dhammasaṃvego udapādi.
atk-s0302a:375_9: apaccavekkhitāhāraparibhogo pañcamaṃ pārājikaṃ katvā paññapetabbo bhaveyya.
atk-s0302a:375_12: Yathā pana kathite pañcamaṃ pārājikaṃ viya naṃ passissanti.
atk-s0302a:375_14: yaṃ āvajjitvā āvajjitvā anāgate bhikkhū cattāro paccaye paccavekkhitvā paribhuñjissantī”ti.
atk-s0302a:376_0: Cattāro pana āhāre vitthāretvā idāni tesu ādīnavaṃ dassetuṃ kathañca,
atk-s0302a:376_3: Tattha jāyampatikāti jāyā ceva pati ca.
atk-s0302a:376_4: Parittaṃ sambalanti puṭabhattasattumodakādīnaṃ aññataraṃ appamattakaṃ pātheyyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:376_7: Kantāranti corakantāraṃ vāḷakantāraṃ amanussakantāraṃ nirudakakantāraṃ appabhakkhakantāranti pañcavidhaṃ.
atk-s0302a:376_12: Yattha balavāmukhayakkhiniādīnaṃ amanussānaṃ vasena bhayaṃ atthi,
atk-s0302a:376_14: Yattha pātuṃ vā nhāyituṃ vā udakaṃ natthi,
atk-s0302a:376_16: Yattha khāditabbaṃ vā bhuñjitabbaṃ vā antamaso kandamūlādimattampi natthi,
atk-s0302a:376_22: Idha pana nirudakaṃ appabhakkhaṃ yojanasatikakantāraṃ adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0302a:376_24: Paṭipajjeyyunti chātakabhayena ceva rogabhayena ca rājabhayena ca upaddutā paṭipajjeyyuṃ “etaṃ kantāraṃ
atk-s0302a:376_25: nittharitvā dhammikassa rañño nirupaddave raṭṭhe sukhaṃ vasissāmā”ti maññamānā.
atk-s0302a:377_0: Ekaputtakoti ukkhipitvā gahito anukampitabbayutto athirasarīro ekaputtako.
atk-s0302a:378_0: Ayaṃ panettha bhūtamatthaṃ katvā ādito paṭṭhāya saṅkhepato atthavaṇṇanā –
atk-s0302a:378_1: dve kira jāyampatikā puttaṃ gahetvā parittena pātheyyena yojanasatikaṃ kantāramaggaṃ paṭipajjiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:378_5: “bhadde ito samantā paññāsayojanāni gāmo vā nigamo vā natthi.
atk-s0302a:378_6: Tasmā yaṃ taṃ purisena kātabbaṃ bahumpi kasigorakkhādikammaṃ,
atk-s0302a:378_7: na dāni sakkā taṃ mayā kātuṃ,
atk-s0302a:378_8: ehi maṃ māretvā upaḍḍhamaṃsaṃ khāditvā upaḍḍhaṃ pātheyyaṃ katvā puttena saddhiṃ kantāraṃ nittharāhī”ti.
atk-s0302a:378_10: “sāmi mayā dāni yaṃ taṃ itthiyā kātabbaṃ bahumpi suttakantanādikammaṃ,
atk-s0302a:378_12: ehi maṃ māretvā upaḍḍhamaṃsaṃ khāditvā upaḍḍhaṃ pātheyyaṃ katvā puttena saddhiṃ kantāraṃ nittharāhī”ti.
atk-s0302a:378_15: Na hi mando kumāro mātarā vinā jīvituṃ sakkoti.
atk-s0302a:378_30: “mayā puttaṃ patthentiyā govatakukkuravatadevatāyācanādīhipi tāva anappakaṃ dukkhamanubhūtaṃ,
atk-s0302a:378_32: Na sakkomi ahaṃ puttaṃ māretu”nti vatvā “tāta,
atk-s0302a:378_35: Te taṃ disvā paridevitvā vuttanayena maṃsāni gahetvā khādantā pakkamiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:379_0: Tesaṃ so puttamaṃsāhāro navahi kāraṇehi paṭikūlattā neva davāya hoti,
atk-s0302a:379_6: Sajātimaṃsatāya ñātimaṃsatāya puttamaṃsatāya piyaputtamaṃsatāya taruṇamaṃsatāya āmakamaṃsatāya abhogamaṃsatāya aloṇatāya adhūpitatāyāti.
atk-s0302a:379_7: Evañhi te navahi kāraṇehi paṭikūlaṃ taṃ puttamaṃsaṃ khādantā na sārattā giddhamānasā hutvā khādiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:379_9: Na aṭṭhinhārucammanissitaṭṭhānāni apanetvā thūlathūlaṃ varamaṃsameva khādiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:379_12: thokaṃ thokaṃ pana ekadivasaṃ yāpanamattameva khādiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:379_15: Na aññaṃ kiñci migamaṃsaṃ vā moramaṃsādīnaṃ vā aññataraṃ khādāmāti sammūḷhā khādiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:379_17: Na “aho vata mayaṃ punapi evarūpaṃ puttamaṃsaṃ khādeyyāmā”ti patthanaṃ katvā khādiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:379_19: Na “ettakaṃ kantāre khāditvā avasiṭṭhaṃ kantāraṃ atikkamma loṇambilādīhi yojetvā khādissāmā”ti sannidhiṃ akaṃsu,
atk-s0302a:379_20: kantārapariyosāne pana “pure mahājano passatī”ti bhūmiyaṃ vā nikhaṇiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:379_22: Na “koci añño amhe viya evarūpaṃ puttamaṃsaṃ khādituṃ na labhatī”ti mānaṃ vā dappaṃ vā akaṃsu,
atk-s0302a:379_24: “Kiṃ iminā aloṇena anambilena adhūpitena duggandhenā”ti na hīḷetvā khādiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:379_26: Na “tuyhaṃ bhāgo mayhaṃ bhāgo tava putto mama putto”ti aññamaññaṃ atimaññiṃsu.
atk-s0302a:379_28: Imaṃ nesaṃ evarūpaṃ nicchandarāgādiparibhogaṃ sampassamāno satthā bhikkhusaṅghampi taṃ kāraṇaṃ anujānāpento taṃ kiṃ maññatha,
atk-s0302a:379_30: api nu te davāya vā āhāraṃ āhāreyyuntiādimāha.
atk-s0302a:380_0: Evameva khoti navannaṃ pāṭikulyānaṃ vasena piyaputtamaṃsasadiso katvā daṭṭhabboti attho.
atk-s0302a:380_6: tāni panetāni gamanapāṭikulyatādīni visuddhimagge āhārapāṭikulyatāniddese vitthāritāneva.
atk-s0302a:380_7: Iti imesaṃ navannaṃ pāṭikulyānaṃ vasena puttamaṃsūpamaṃ katvā āhāro paribhuñjitabbo.
atk-s0302a:381_0: Yathā te jāyampatikā pāṭikulyaṃ piyaputtamaṃsaṃ khādantā na sārattā giddhamānasā hutvā khādiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:381_3: Yathā ca te na aṭṭhinhārucammanissitaṃ apanetvā thūlathūlaṃ varamaṃsameva khādiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:381_5: evaṃ sukkhabhattamandabyañjanādīni piṭṭhihatthena apaṭikkhipitvā vaṭṭakena viya kukkuṭena viya ca odhiṃ
atk-s0302a:381_6: adassetvā tato tato sappimaṃsādisaṃsaṭṭhavarabhojanaṃyeva vicinitvā abhuñjantena sīhena viya sapadānaṃ
atk-s0302a:382_0: Yathā ca te na yāvadatthaṃ kaṇṭhappamāṇaṃ khādiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:382_1: thokaṃ thokaṃ pana ekekadivasaṃ yāpanamattameva khādiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:382_2: evameva āharahatthakādibrāhmaṇānaṃ aññatarena viya yāvadatthaṃ udarāvadehakaṃ abhuñjantena catunnaṃ pañcannaṃ
atk-s0302a:382_3: vā ālopānaṃ okāsaṃ ṭhapetvāva dhammasenāpatinā viya paribhuñjitabbo.
atk-s0302a:382_4: So kira pañcacattālīsa vassāni tiṭṭhamāno “pacchābhatte ambiluggārasamuṭṭhāpakaṃ katvā ekadivasampi āhāraṃ
atk-s0302a:382_5: na āhāresi”nti vatvā sīhanādaṃ nadanto imaṃ gāthamāha –
atk-s0302a:385_0: Yathā ca te na aññamaññaṃ maccharāyantā khādiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:385_2: evameva piṇḍapātaṃ labhitvā amaccharāyitvā “imaṃ sabbaṃ gaṇhantassa sabbaṃ dassāmi,
atk-s0302a:385_6: Yathā ca te na “aññaṃ kiñci mayaṃ migamaṃsaṃ vā moramaṃsādīnaṃ vā aññataraṃ khādāmā”ti sammūḷhā khādiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:385_8: evameva piṇḍapātaṃ labhitvā “ahaṃ khādāmi bhuñjāmī”ti attūpaladdhisammohaṃ anuppādetvā “kabaḷīkārāhāro na jānāti ‘cātumahābhūtikakāyaṃ vaḍḍhemī’ti,
atk-s0302a:386_0: Yathā ca te na “aho vata mayaṃ punapi evarūpaṃ puttamaṃsaṃ khādeyyāmā”ti patthanaṃ katvā khādiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:386_2: evameva paṇītabhojanaṃ laddhā ‘aho vatāhaṃ svepi punadivasepi evarūpaṃ labheyyaṃ’,
atk-s0302a:386_3: lūkhaṃ vā pana laddhā “hiyyo viya me ajja paṇītabhojanaṃ na laddha”nti patthanaṃ vā anusocanaṃ vā akatvā nittaṇhena –
atk-s0302a:390_0: Yathā ca te na “ettakaṃ kantāre khāditvā avasiṭṭhaṃ kantāraṃ atikkamma loṇambilādīhi yojetvā khādissāmā”ti sannidhiṃ akaṃsu,
atk-s0302a:390_1: kantārapariyosāne pana “pure mahājano passatī”ti bhūmiyaṃ vā nikhaṇiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:395_0: Imaṃ ovādaṃ anussarantena catūsu paccayesu yaṃ yaṃ labhati,
atk-s0302a:395_2: sesaṃ sabrahmacārīnaṃ vissajjetvā sannidhiṃ parivajjantena paribhuñjitabbo.
atk-s0302a:395_3: Yathā ca te na “koci añño amhe viya evarūpaṃ puttamaṃsaṃ khādituṃ na labhatī”ti mānaṃ vā dappaṃ vā akaṃsu,
atk-s0302a:395_5: evameva paṇītabhojanaṃ labhitvā “ahamasmi lābhī cīvarapiṇḍapātādīna”nti na māno vā dappo vā kātabbo.
atk-s0302a:395_7: arahattahetu panāyaṃ pabbajjā”ti paccavekkhitvā nihatamānadappeneva paribhuñjitabbo.
atk-s0302a:396_0: Yathā ca te “kiṃ iminā aloṇena anambilena adhūpitena duggandhenā”ti hīḷetvā na khādiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:396_2: evameva piṇḍapātaṃ labhitvā “kiṃ iminā assagoṇabhattasadisena lūkhena nirasena,
atk-s0302a:396_3: suvānadoṇiyaṃ taṃ pakkhipathā”ti evaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ vā “ko imaṃ bhuñjissati,
atk-s0302a:396_4: kākasunakhādīnaṃ dehī”ti evaṃ dāyakaṃ vā ahīḷentena –
atk-s0302a:398_0: Appaṃ dānaṃ na hīḷeyya, dātāraṃ nāvajāniyā”ti. ; –
atk-s0302a:399_3: tava putto mama putto”ti aññamaññaṃ atimaññiṃsu,
atk-s0302a:399_6: evamevaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ labhitvā yathā ekacco “ko tumhādisānaṃ dassati nikkāraṇā ummāresu pakkhalantānaṃ
atk-s0302a:399_7: āhiṇḍantānaṃ vijātamātāpi vo dātabbaṃ na maññati,
atk-s0302a:399_8: mayaṃ pana gatagataṭṭhāne paṇītāni cīvarādīni labhāmā”ti sīlavante sabrahmacārī atimaññati,
atk-s0302a:400_0: “So tena lābhasakkārasilokena abhibhūto pariyādiṇṇacitto aññe pesale bhikkhū atimaññati.
atk-s0302a:401_0: Evaṃ kañci anatimaññitvā sabbehi sabrahmacārīhi saddhiṃ samaggena sammodamānena hutvā paribhuñjitabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:402_0: Pariññāteti ñātapariññā tīraṇapariññā pahānapariññāti imāhi tīhi pariññāhi pariññāte. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0302a:402_1: Idha bhikkhu “kabaḷīkārāhāro nāma ayaṃ savatthukavasena ojaṭṭhamakarūpaṃ hoti,
atk-s0302a:402_6: Iti ojaṭṭhamakaṃ jivhāpasādo tassa paccayāni mahābhūtānīti ime dhammā rūpakkhandho nāma,
atk-s0302a:402_7: taṃ pariggaṇhato uppannā phassapañcamakā dhammā cattāro arūpakkhandhā.
atk-s0302a:402_8: Iti sabbepime pañcakkhandhā saṅkhepato nāmarūpamattaṃ hotī”ti pajānāti.
atk-s0302a:402_9: So te dhamme sarasalakkhaṇato vavatthapetvā tesaṃ paccayaṃ pariyesanto anulomapaṭilomaṃ paṭiccasamuppādaṃ passati.
atk-s0302a:402_10: Ettāvatānena kabaḷīkārāhāramukhena sappaccayassa nāmarūpassa yāthāvato diṭṭhattā kabaḷīkārāhāro ñātapariññāya pariññāto hoti.
atk-s0302a:402_11: So tadeva sappaccayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti tīṇi lakkhaṇāni āropetvā sattannaṃ anupassanānaṃ vasena sammasati.
atk-s0302a:402_13: Tasmiṃyeva nāmarūpe chandarāgāvakaḍḍhanena anāgāmimaggena parijānatā pahānapariññāya pariññāto hotīti.
atk-s0302a:403_1: Ettha pana tisso pariññā ekapariññā sabbapariññā mūlapariññāti.
atk-s0302a:403_4: tena pañcakāmaguṇiko rāgo pariññātova hotīti. Kasmā?
atk-s0302a:403_6: Sāyeva hi taṇhā cakkhudvāre uppannā rūparāgo nāma hoti,
atk-s0302a:403_8: Iti yathā ekasseva corassa pañcamagge hanato ekasmiṃ magge gahetvā sīse chinne pañcapi maggā khemā honti,
atk-s0302a:403_9: evaṃ jivhādvāre rasataṇhāya pariññātāya pañcakāmaguṇiko rāgo pariññāto hotīti ayaṃ ekapariññā nāma.
atk-s0302a:404_1: Patte pakkhittapiṇḍapātasmiñhi ekasmiṃyeva pañcakāmaguṇikarāgo labbhati. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0302a:404_2: Parisuddhaṃ tāvassa vaṇṇaṃ olokayato rūparāgo hoti,
atk-s0302a:404_3: uṇhe sappimhi tattha āsiñcante paṭapaṭāti saddo uṭṭhahati,
atk-s0302a:404_4: tathārūpaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā khādantassa murumurūti saddo uppajjati,
atk-s0302a:404_9: Iti imasmiṃ āhāre satisampajaññena pariggahetvā nicchandarāgaparibhogena paribhutte sabbopi so pariññāto hotīti ayaṃ sabbapariññā nāma.
atk-s0302a:405_3: Brāhmaṇatissabhaye kira dvādasa vassāni jāyampatikānaṃ upanijjhānacittaṃ nāma nāhosi. Kasmā?
atk-s0302a:405_5: Bhaye pana vūpasante yojanasatiko tambapaṇṇidīpo dārakānaṃ jātamaṅgalehi ekamaṅgalo ahosi.
atk-s0302a:405_6: Iti mūlabhūte āhāre pariññāte pañcakāmaguṇiko rāgo pariññātova hotīti ayaṃ mūlapariññā nāma.
atk-s0302a:406_0: Natthi taṃ saṃyojananti tena rāgena saddhiṃ pahānekaṭṭhatāya pahīnattā natthi.
atk-s0302a:406_2: “Ettakena pana mā vosānaṃ āpajjiṃsū”ti etesaṃyeva rūpādīnaṃ vasena pañcasu khandhesu vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā yāva arahattā kathetuṃ vaṭṭatīti.
atk-s0302a:407_0: Dutiye niccammāti khurato paṭṭhāya yāva siṅgamūlā sakalasarīrato uddālitacammā kiṃsukarāsivaṇṇā.
atk-s0302a:407_1: Kasmā pana aññaṃ hatthiassagoṇādiupamaṃ agahetvā niccammagāvūpamā gahitāti?
atk-s0302a:407_3: Mātugāmo hi uppannaṃ dukkhavedanaṃ titikkhituṃ adhivāsetuṃ na sakkoti,
atk-s0302a:407_4: evameva phassāhāro abalo dubbaloti dassanatthaṃ sadisameva upamaṃ āhari.
atk-s0302a:407_11: Sā tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhāne taṃ taṃṭhānasannissayamūlikaṃ pāṇakhādanabhayaṃ sampassamānā neva attano sakkārasammānaṃ,
atk-s0302a:407_13: evameva bhikkhu phassāhāramūlakaṃ kilesapāṇakakhādanabhayaṃ sampassamāno tebhūmakaphassena anatthiko hoti.
atk-s0302a:408_8: tesaṃ vatthārammaṇāni rūpakkhandho”ti evaṃ sappaccayassa nāmarūpassa yāthāvato dassanaṃ ñātapariññā.
atk-s0302a:408_9: Tattheva tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā sattannaṃ anupassanānaṃ vasena aniccādito tulanaṃ tīraṇapariññā.
atk-s0302a:408_10: Tasmiṃyeva pana nāmarūpe chandarāganikkaḍḍhano arahattamaggo pahānapariññā.
atk-s0302a:408_11: Tisso vedanāti evaṃ phassāhāre tīhi pariññāhi pariññāte tisso vedanā pariññātāva honti tammūlakattā taṃsampayuttattā ca.
atk-s0302a:408_12: Iti phassāhāravasena desanā yāva arahattā kathitā.
atk-s0302a:409_0: Tatiye aṅgārakāsūti aṅgārānaṃ kāsu. Kāsūti rāsipi vuccati āvāṭopi.
atk-s0302a:416_4: Jālāya vā hi dhūme vā sati vāto samuṭṭhāti,
atk-s0302a:417_4: Tesaṃ taṃ purisaṃ nānābāhāsu gahetvā aṅgārakāsuṃ upakaḍḍhanakālo viya puthujjanassa kammāyūhanakālo.
atk-s0302a:417_6: Aṅgārakāsunidānaṃ dukkhaṃ viya kammanidānaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:418_2: Tisso taṇhāti kāmataṇhā bhavataṇhā vibhavataṇhāti imā pariññātā honti. Kasmā?
atk-s0302a:418_4: Na hi hetumhi appahīne phalaṃ pahīyati.
atk-s0302a:418_5: Iti manosañcetanāhāravasenapi yāva arahattā desanā kathitā.
atk-s0302a:419_1: Kathaṃ so purisoti so puriso kathaṃbhūto,
atk-s0302a:420_4: āgucāriṃ purisaṃ “tīhi sattisatehi hanathā”ti raññā āṇattakālo viya kammaraññā vaṭṭasannissitaputhujjanaṃ gahetvā paṭisandhiyaṃ pakkhipanakālo.
atk-s0302a:420_5: Tattha kiñcāpi tīṇi sattisatāni viya paṭisandhiviññāṇaṃ,
atk-s0302a:420_9: dinnāya pana paṭisandhiyā pavatte vipākadukkhaṃ sattipahaṭavaṇamūlakaṃ dukkhaṃ viya hoti.
atk-s0302a:421_3: Viññāṇasmiñhi pariññāte taṃ pariññātameva hoti tammūlakattā sahuppannattā ca.
atk-s0302a:421_4: Iti viññāṇāhāravasenapi yāva arahattā desanā kathitāti.
atk-s0302a:423_5: Patiṭṭhitaṃ tattha viññāṇaṃ virūḷhanti kammaṃ javāpetvā paṭisandhiākaḍḍhanasamatthatāya patiṭṭhitañceva virūḷhañca.
atk-s0302a:423_8: Atthi tattha saṅkhārānaṃ vuddhīti idaṃ imasmiṃ vipākavaṭṭe ṭhitassa āyativaṭṭahetuke saṅkhāre sandhāya vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:423_9: Yattha atthi āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbattīti yasmiṃ ṭhāne āyatiṃ punabbhavābhinibbatti atthi.
atk-s0302a:424_3: Yathā rajakacittakārā parisuddhesu phalakādīsu rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpenti,
atk-s0302a:424_5: Tattha yathā akusalena cittakārena samuṭṭhāpitaṃ rūpaṃ virūpaṃ hoti dussaṇṭhitaṃ amanāpaṃ,
atk-s0302a:424_6: evameva ekacco kammaṃ karonto ñāṇavippayuttena cittena karoti,
atk-s0302a:424_7: taṃ kammaṃ rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpentaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ sampattiṃ adatvā dubbaṇṇaṃ dussaṇṭhitaṃ mātāpitūnampi amanāpaṃ rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-s0302a:424_8: Yathā pana kusalena cittakārena samuṭṭhāpitaṃ rūpaṃ surūpaṃ hoti susaṇṭhitaṃ manāpaṃ,
atk-s0302a:424_9: evameva ekacco kammaṃ karonto ñāṇasampayuttena cittena karoti,
atk-s0302a:424_10: taṃ kammaṃ rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpentaṃ cakkhādīnaṃ sampattiṃ datvā suvaṇṇaṃ susaṇṭhitaṃ alaṅkatapaṭiyattaṃ viya rūpaṃ samuṭṭhāpeti.
atk-s0302a:425_0: Ettha ca āhāraṃ viññāṇena saddhiṃ saṅkhipitvā āhāranāmarūpānaṃ antare eko sandhi,
atk-s0302a:425_1: vipākavidhiṃ nāmarūpena saṅkhipitvā nāmarūpasaṅkhārānaṃ antare eko sandhi,
atk-s0302a:425_2: saṅkhārānañca āyatibhavassa ca antare eko sandhīti veditabbo.
atk-s0302a:426_2: Evameva khoti ettha khīṇāsavassa kammaṃ sūriyarasmisamaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0302a:426_4: sā kevalaṃ patiṭṭhāya abhāvena appatiṭṭhā nāma jātā,
atk-s0302a:426_7: tehi pana katakammaṃ kusalākusalaṃ nāma na hoti,
atk-s0302a:426_9: Evamassa kammaṃ natthitāya eva appatiṭṭhaṃ nāma jātanti.
atk-s0302a:428_1: Pañcame nāmarūpe kho sati viññāṇanti ettha “saṅkhāresu sati viññāṇa”nti ca “avijjāya sati saṅkhārā”ti ca vattabbaṃ bhaveyya,
atk-s0302a:428_4: tehi saddhiṃ ayaṃ vipassanā na ghaṭīyati.
atk-s0302a:429_0: Nanu ca avijjāsaṅkhāresu adiṭṭhesu na sakkā buddhena bhavitunti.
atk-s0302a:429_3: Tasmā yathā nāma godhaṃ anubandhanto puriso taṃ kūpaṃ paviṭṭhaṃ disvā otaritvā paviṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ khaṇitvā godhaṃ gahetvā pakkameyya,
atk-s0302a:429_6: Evaṃ mahāpurisopi godhaṃ anubandhanto puriso viya bodhipallaṅke nisinno jarāmaraṇato paṭṭhāya “imassa ayaṃ paccayo,
atk-s0302a:429_7: imassa ayaṃ paccayo”ti pariyesanto yāva nāmarūpadhammānaṃ paccayaṃ disvā tassapi paccayaṃ pariyesanto viññāṇameva addasa.
atk-s0302a:429_9: parato tucchakūpassa abhinnaṭṭhānaṃ viya avijjāsaṅkhāradvayaṃ atthi,
atk-s0302a:429_10: tadetaṃ heṭṭhā vipassanāya gahitattā pāṭiyekkaṃ sammasanūpagaṃ na hotīti na aggahesi.
atk-s0302a:430_7: Ettāvatā jāyetha vātiādīsu viññāṇe nāmarūpassa paccaye honte,
atk-s0302a:430_9: dvīsupi aññamaññapaccayesu hontesu ettakena jāyetha vā upapajjetha vā.
atk-s0302a:430_10: Ito hi paraṃ kimaññaṃ jāyetha vā upapajjetha vā,
atk-s0302a:430_11: nanu etadeva jāyati ca upapajjati cāti?
atk-s0302a:431_0: Evaṃ saddhiṃ aparāparacutipaṭisandhīhi pañca padāni dassetvā puna taṃ ettāvatāti vuttamatthaṃ niyyātento yadidaṃ nāmarūpapaccayā viññāṇaṃ,
atk-s0302a:431_1: viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpanti vatvā tato paraṃ anulomapaccayākāravasena viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpamūlakaṃ āyatijarāmaraṇaṃ
atk-s0302a:432_1: Uddhāpavantanti āpato uggatattā uddhāpanti laddhavohārena pākāravatthunā samannāgataṃ.
atk-s0302a:432_2: Ramaṇīyanti samantā catunnaṃ dvārānaṃ abbhantare ca nānābhaṇḍānaṃ sampattiyā ramaṇīyaṃ.
atk-s0302a:432_5: Kārento ca paṭhamaṃ aṭṭhārasa manussakoṭiyo pesetvā “sampuṇṇa”nti pucchitvā “na tāva sampuṇṇa”nti vutte aparāni pañcakulāni peseyya.
atk-s0302a:432_6: Puna pucchitvā “na tāva sampuṇṇa”nti vutte aparāni pañcapaññāsakulāni peseyya.
atk-s0302a:432_7: Puna pucchitvā “na tāva sampuṇṇa”nti vutte aparāni tiṃsa kulāni peseyya.
atk-s0302a:432_8: Puna pucchitvā “na tāva sampuṇṇa”nti vutte aparaṃ kulasahassaṃ peseyya.
atk-s0302a:432_9: Puna pucchitvā “na tāva sampuṇṇa”nti vutte aparāni ekādasanahutāni kulāni peseyya.
atk-s0302a:432_10: Puna pucchitvā “na tāva sampuṇṇa”nti vutte aparāni caturāsītikulasahassāni peseyya.
atk-s0302a:432_15: iminā nayena kulāni pesetvā na sakkā pūretuṃ,
atk-s0302a:432_16: bheriṃ pana carāpetvā ‘amhākaṃ nagaraṃ imāya ca imāya ca sampattiyā sampannaṃ,
atk-s0302a:432_19: imañcimañca parihāraṃ labhissantī’ti nagarassa ceva vaṇṇaṃ lokassa ca parihāralābhaṃ ghosāpethā”ti vadeyya.
atk-s0302a:432_21: Tato manussā nagaraguṇañceva parihāralābhañca sutvā sabbadisāhi samosaritvā nagaraṃ pūreyyuṃ.
atk-s0302a:432_22: Taṃ aparena samayena iddhañceva assa phītañca.
atk-s0302a:432_23: Taṃ sandhāya tadassa nagaraṃ aparena samayena iddhañceva phītañcātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0302a:434_1: araññapavane caramānapuriso viya hi dīpaṅkarapādamūlato paṭṭhāya pāramiyo pūrayamāno mahāpuriso daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0302a:434_2: tassa purisassa pubbakehi manussehi anuyātamaggadassanaṃ viya mahāsattassa anupubbena bodhipallaṅke nisinnassa
atk-s0302a:434_4: purisassa taṃ ekapadikamaggaṃ anugacchato aparabhāge mahāmaggadassanaṃ viya mahāsattassa uparivipassanāya ciṇṇante lokuttaramaggadassanaṃ,
atk-s0302a:434_5: purisassa teneva maggena gacchato purato nagaradassanaṃ viya tathāgatassa nibbānanagaradassanaṃ,
atk-s0302a:434_10: Tassa purisassa catunnaṃ dvārānaṃ diṭṭhakālo viya tathāgatassa catunnaṃ maggānaṃ diṭṭhakālo,
atk-s0302a:434_11: tassa catūhi dvārehi nagaraṃ paviṭṭhakālo viya tathāgatassa catūhi maggehi nibbānaṃ paviṭṭhakālo,
atk-s0302a:434_12: tassa nagarabbhantare bhaṇḍavavatthānakālo viya tathāgatassa paccavekkhaṇañāṇena paropaṇṇāsakusaladhammavavatthānakālo.
atk-s0302a:434_13: Nagarassa agārakaraṇatthaṃ kulapariyesanakālo viya satthu phalasamāpattito vuṭṭhāya veneyyasatte volokanakālo,
atk-s0302a:434_14: tena purisena yācitassa rañño ekaṃ mahākuṭumbikaṃ diṭṭhakālo viya mahābrahmunā yācitassa bhagavato aññāsikoṇḍaññattheraṃ diṭṭhakālo,
atk-s0302a:434_15: rañño mahākuṭumbikaṃ pakkosāpetvā “nagaravāsaṃ karohī”ti pahitakālo viya bhagavato ekasmiṃ pacchābhatte
atk-s0302a:434_16: aṭṭhārasayojanamaggaṃ gantvā āsāḷhipuṇṇamadivase bārāṇasiyaṃ isipatanaṃ pavisitvā theraṃ kāyasakkhiṃ
atk-s0302a:434_18: mahākuṭumbikena aṭṭhārasa purisakoṭiyo gahetvā nagaraṃ ajjhāvuṭṭhakālo viya tathāgatena dhammacakke pavattite
atk-s0302a:434_19: therassa aṭṭhārasahi brahmakoṭīhi saddhiṃ sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhitakālo,
atk-s0302a:434_21: tato sampuṇṇaṃ nagaranti pucchitvā na tāvāti vutte pañca kulāni ādiṃ katvā yāva caturāsītikulasahassapesanaṃ
atk-s0302a:434_22: viya tathāgatassa pañcamadivasato paṭṭhāya anattalakkhaṇasuttādīni desetvā pañcavaggiye ādiṃ katvā yasapamukhā
atk-s0302a:434_27: tirokuṭṭānumodane caturāsītisahassānīti ettakassa janassa ariyamaggaṃ otāretvā nibbānanagaraṃ pesitakālo,
atk-s0302a:434_28: atha tena nayena nagare apūriyamāne bheriṃ carāpetvā nagarassa vaṇṇaghosanaṃ kulānaṃ parihāralābhaghosanaṃ
atk-s0302a:434_29: viya ca māsassa aṭṭha divase tattha tattha nisīditvā dhammakathikānaṃ nibbānavaṇṇassa ceva nibbānappattānaṃ
atk-s0302a:434_31: tato sabbadisāhi āgantvā manussānaṃ nagarasamosaraṇaṃ viya tattha tattha dhammakathaṃ sutvā tato tato
atk-s0302a:434_32: nikkhamitvā pabbajjaṃ ādiṃ katvā anulomapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannānaṃ aparimāṇānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ nibbānasamosaraṇaṃ
atk-s0302a:435_8: Yāva devamanussehi suppakāsitanti yāva dasasahassacakkavāḷe devamanussehi paricchedo atthi,
atk-s0302a:435_9: etasmiṃ antare suppakāsitaṃ sudesitaṃ tathāgatenāti. Pañcamaṃ.
atk-s0302a:437_3: Tasmiṃ kira janapade manussā sahetukā paññavanto.
atk-s0302a:437_6: te gambhīraṃ tilakkhaṇāhataṃ dhammakathaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ samatthā honti.
atk-s0302a:437_9: saṃyuttake cūḷanidānādisuttanti evamādīni aññāni gambhīrāni suttāni tattheva kathesi.
atk-s0302a:437_12: Na so bhikkhu bhagavato cittaṃ ārādhesīti paccayākāravasena byākārāpetukāmassa bhagavato tathā abyākaritvā
atk-s0302a:438_4: Aññattha hi evaṃ vuttaṃ nāma natthi.
